content.title: Alterline
content.description: This was the second game ever released by Exponential Software (MightyMawse Games) and aimed to replicate the immersive story telling found in games such as The Stanley Parable & The Beginners Guide by developer Davey Wreden.

content.title: BluPoint
content.description: BluPoint intended to deliver what Alterlite had ambitiously attempted but with a more polished outcome.

content.title: Fallen Too Far
content.description: Fallen Too Far (FTF) is a side scrolling 2.5D platformer that is comparable to games such as Limbo & Inside.

content.title: Galaxy Run
content.description: Galaxy Run was the first ever 3D game constructed by Exponential (MightyMawse Games) it plays as a fast paced block dodging game and was a tutorial game.

content.title: Galaxy Run v1.3
content.description: Galaxy Run v1.3 was created in response to user requests, it allowed for customisable graphics settings, broader control scheme and two additional levels.

content.title: Quest For Burt
content.description: Quest For Burt was the first foray into a first person shooter style project, while clunky and often times impossible to complete due to game design, its character shines through!

content.title: Trench Run
content.description: Trench Run is another fast paced speed run game that has the player flying through an endless trench dodging rock formations.
